title: 3 Dead, 19 Missing After Floods and Landslides in North and Central Regions
excerpt: At least 3 people have died and 19 others are missing after heavy rains struck in central and northern Chile over the weekend. The heavy rains, unusual for this time of year in Chile, caused flooding and mudslides, blocking roads and leaving communities isolated.
